code: export var postAnnouncement=function postAnnouncement(announInfo,token){return fetch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/announcements/new"),{method:"POST",headers:{Accept:"Application/json","Content-Type":"Application/json",Authorization:"Bearer
